attributes.action: Reverse and do not allow Civil Partnership 'Gay Marriage' for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reverse the stupid change that should never have been passed or
allowed to happen, 'Marriage' is for 'normal' straight people,
being gay is not normal and those that dissagree with this,
need further education on the fact that it was Adam and Eve,
not Adam and Steve. Civil partnerships are not and should not be the same as Marriage, and should not allow the same rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
